name: Save Your World!
description:
I made this Game for the ludum dare game jam. The Topic was small world.

This is my first participation in a game jam ever. Learned making Games in Unity for two weeks to prepare for it. Assets and Music do not belong to me. Got them mostly from Opengameart.com and the unity asset store.

Special credits to:

Lose Music: by James Roach

Win Music: by Zabutom

Background Music: https://dubmood.bandcamp.com/album/chiptune-7-data...by Bandcamp
